item.title: First Post
item.description: Trying another hugo static site generation template. Maybe I will actually do some blogging this time around. Who knows. I never seem to find the time though.

item.title: A Brief Bio
item.description: A technical leader with strategic vision and experience, Ray makes informed data driven decisions when possible and strong decisions based on experience when necessary. Ray empowers teams ultimately creating inclusive environments that increase commitment and performance producing results. Rayâ€™s technical background allows him to understand challenges and coach while collaborating across the organization contributing to a winning team and organization. Ray has a proven ability to clearly communicate with executives and peers, as well as members of the technical teams.
